message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I can only commit to a maximum of $1,000,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm not able to go that low.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident it's still a good value for you. What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $980,000 for your product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us both. Looking forward to your thoughts!
